Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具・装飾品屋「大海原」
Entry.EnglishText: Armor and Accessories Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 武器屋「ビッグウェーブ」
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン・装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown - Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具と装飾品を 置いてるわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Armors and accessories for sale right here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Buy Accessories Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また買いに来てね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back and buy again!

Entry.JapaneseText: またよろしくね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you later!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、外ですごい 物音がしたわ…… 悲鳴も聞こえたし……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard something strange coming from outside... I think I heard a scream, too...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時、身を守る物が あれば安心よ！
Entry.EnglishText: Protecting yourself is necessary at times like this!

Entry.JapaneseText: そして私は、どんな時も、 商売、商売……
Entry.EnglishText: As for me... I'll be here selling my wares, no matter what...

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、ハーフが 実在しただなんて…… 信じられないわよね。
Entry.EnglishText: To think that Halfs exist... I can't believe it.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか気持ち悪いし…… 私は普通でよかったわ！
Entry.EnglishText: It kinda grosses me out... I'm glad I'm normal!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ヒューマに生まれて 良かったわ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm really glad I was born a Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはみすぼらしいし、 ハーフは気味が悪いものね。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are a shabby lot, and Halfs are hideous too!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのうなり声みたいなのが ずっと聞こえてるのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm always hearing this... sound that reminds me of a Gajuma's growl...

Entry.JapaneseText: 新手の嫌がらせかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this some new form of harassment or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマだけ外出禁止なんて 不公平だと思わない？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think it's a little unfair that us Huma are locked inside?

Entry.JapaneseText: 筋肉バカのガジュマのほうが、 暴れたら大変なのにね！
Entry.EnglishText: Considering that it would be bad if one of those meatheaded Gajuma started rampaging outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの事、あれこれ悪く 言っちゃったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I said some really horrible things about Gajuma, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ホントは仲良くしたいと 思ってたの……今からでも、 遅く……ないよね？
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest, I really want to get along with them... I still can... right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 試着したいものがあったら サイズ出すわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If there's something you want to try on, I can bring out one that fits you.

Entry.JapaneseText: またね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフにはビックリしたけど、 お店は落ち着いて営業中よ。
Entry.EnglishText: That whole thing with the Half was a bit of a surprise, but now that it's all sorted out, we're back in business.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Buy Accessories Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また買いに来てね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back and buy again!

Entry.JapaneseText: またよろしくね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you later!

Entry.JapaneseText: またね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマには売らない方針なの！ 帰ってちょーだい！
Entry.EnglishText: We don't sell to Gajuma! Go somewhere else!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ専門に営業中よ！ 何にする？
Entry.EnglishText: We're open for business, especially for Huma! Come, buy something!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Buy Accessories Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また買いに来てね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back and buy again!

Entry.JapaneseText: またよろしくね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you later!

Entry.JapaneseText: またね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具と装飾品を 置いてるわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Armors and accessories for sale right here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Buy Accessories Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また買いに来てね。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back and buy again!

Entry.JapaneseText: またよろしくね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you later!

Entry.JapaneseText: またね。
Entry.EnglishText: See you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>バトルブックに <Red>宝石合成<Green>についての 説明が追加されました。
Entry.EnglishText: An explanation about <Red>Gem Synthesis<White> has been added to the <Green>Battle Book<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120>バトルブックを読みますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120>Read the Battle Book? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のガジュマの店が、 ヒューマお断りだって言ってるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I saw that the store ran by Gajuma don't allow Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチはガジュマお断りの 店にしたんだよ！ しっしっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go buy there instead! I don't accept Gajuma like you! Shoo!

Entry.JapaneseText: うちで旅の準備をしては どうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: How about I help you in your journey?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 武器を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Weapons Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 備えあれば、 憂いなしだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have nothing to fear as long as you're prepared.

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんか大変な事 なってるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: L-Looks like there's something horrible happening at the moment, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: おらっちの武器があれば、 何も怖くない……よ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing to fear as long as you have a weapon in... hand.
Entry.Notes: I think there's something lost in translation here. Like a pun. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様はベッピンさんだって 聞いたんだけどさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard Her Majesty, the Queen is really pretty...

Entry.JapaneseText: おらっちは、ヒューマの女の ほうがイイなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: But I still think a Huma girl is prettier...

Entry.JapaneseText: おらっちの店の商品は、 ヒューマが使ってこその品だよ。
Entry.EnglishText: My shop only sells items to Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヘンな音がしてるねぇ。 ガジュマどものイヤがらせかな？
Entry.EnglishText: What a weird sound... Are those Gajuma harassing us?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ外出禁止なんて、 信じられないよ、まったく！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe that us Huma aren't allowed to go outside!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのお客さんが来なくなったら、 おらっち、おまんま食い上げだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll lose my livelihood here if Huma stop coming by!

Entry.JapaneseText: 下の店に入り浸ってるガジュマの おばさん……楽しそうなんだよなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: That Gajuma lady that hangs around downstairs seem to be enjoying herself.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ見たら、種族の事を言ってる おらっちがバカに見えてきてさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I see her, I can't help but feel dumb for what I thought about race.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういうのはヤメにしたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh I know! I'll stop thinking about it!

Entry.JapaneseText: 泣くのがイヤなら、おらっちの 店で何か買っていった方がいいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't want to cry, then come here and buy!

Entry.JapaneseText: どれも自慢の逸品だからさ、 買って損はないよ！
Entry.EnglishText: These items are my pride and joy. You won't regret buying any of them!

Entry.JapaneseText: 備えあれば、 憂いなしだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have nothing to fear as long as you're prepared.

Entry.JapaneseText: うちで旅の準備をしては どうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: How about I help you in your journey?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 武器を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Weapons Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 備えあれば、 憂いなしだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have nothing to fear as long as you're prepared.

Entry.JapaneseText: 備えあれば、 憂いなしだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have nothing to fear as long as you're prepared.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『トータスキングのヨロイ』 サニイタウンの伝説の戦士・トータスが 着ていたとされるヨロイのレプリカ。 ピンチになるとヨロイの中に手足を入れて 身を守る事ができる。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Tortoise King Armor - A replica of the armor worn by Sunnytown's legendary warrior: Tortoise. You can retract your arms and legs into the armor whenever you're in danger.
